title: Block Sensor
description: Fires off a specified event when a block in the block list is broken within the sensor range.

sensor_radius.description: The maximum radius in blocks in which a specified block can be detected.
sensor_radius.title: Sensor Radius

block_list.description: Blocks that will trigger the component when broken and what event will trigger.

on_block_broken.title: On Block Broken
on_block_broken.description: Event to run when a block breaks

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: List of sources that break the block to listen for. If none are specified, then all block breaks will be detected
